content: slip_stitch f/o sew end closed insert hook towards the inside and move right to left to keep the right side of the single crochet facing out how to place row 16 and similar row afterwards the blue marker does not count as a stitch the red marker is where you begin the instructions ear make 2 round 1 magic_ring 4 round 2 increase around 8 round 3-9 single_crochet around 7 rounds 8 slip_stitch f/o do not stuff small horn make 4 round 1 magic_ring 4 round 2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 4 round 4 single_crochet increase around 6 slip_stitch f/o do not stuff smallest horn make 2 follow round 1-3 of small horn slip_stitch f/o do not stuff wing arm make 2 round 1 magic_ring 4 round 2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 4 round 4 single_crochet increase 2sc 5 round 5-6 single_crochet around 2 rounds 5 round 7 2sc increase 2sc 6 round 8-17 single_crochet around 10 rounds round 18 2sc increase 2sc increase 8 round 19-21 single_crochet around 3 rounds 8 round 22 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc 10 slip_stitch f/o leave a tail for sewing wing make 2 see pictures insert hook into the tip of the wing arm and pull through a loop to start a chain all slip_stitch are in chain 32 until you get to the wing arm row 1 chain 32 from tip of wing arm row 2 starting 3rd chain from hook 16dc across slip_stitch next 2 in chain chain 2 turn row 3 from 2nd slip_stitch 16dc across will leave one stitch empty from previous row chain 1 turn row 4 16sc across slip_stitch 2 chain 2 turn repeat the double_crochet and single_crochet row with 2 slip_stitch into chain until last chain continue the single_crochet and double_crochet row as previous up the wing arm by slip_stitch directly into it making sure to keep them evenly spaced 9 sets of slip stitches slip_stitch f/o at the edge of the wing arm leave long tail for sewing lightly stuff tip of the wing arm where you will start your chain after you chain part of the wing complete finished with the chain portion about to start slip stitches on the wing arm back legs make 2 round 1 magic_ring 6 round 2 single_crochet increase repeat around 9 round 3 single_crochet back loop only around 9 round 4-5 single_crochet around 2 rounds 9 round 6 single_crochet increase increase single_crochet around to beginning 11 round 7 single_crochet around 11 round 8 single_crochet increase increase 3sc decrease decrease single_crochet 11 round 9-10 single_crochet around 2 rounds 11 round 11 2sc decrease single_crochet around to beginning 10 round 12 2sc decrease 2sc decrease 2sc 8 slip_stitch f/o leave tail for sewing front legs make 2 round 1 magic_ring 6 round 2 single_crochet increase repeat around 9 round 3 back loop 2sc increase repeat around 12 round 4 5sc decrease 3sc decrease 10 round 5 single_crochet around 10 round 6 3sc decrease single_crochet decrease 2sc 8 round 7-9 single_crochet
